name: Rachael & Jon
review: “We absolutely loved Clint & Cindy. They were so professional and also so much fun. When we were shopping around for wedding photographers they stood out to us and did for numerous reasons. First of all, they were super fast in responding to our messages and so personable. They also took the time to answer all our questions over zoom. During the actual even it was so helpful to have both of them on site to not only help me with my dress, but to capture all the memories. We absolutely love our pictures!”

name: Jennifer + Eric
review: “Where do i Start…. So many great things to say about them! They by far were my favorite vendor at my wedding. They both made our day a lot less stressful! Super helpful, funny, and very on top of making sure things went smoothly. Not one time did I see them sitting idle doing nothing. I have not gotten all the photos back, but what I have seen so far is AMAZING!”

name: Rachel + Justin
review: “We can’t express enough on how much we loved working with Clint and Cindy. They did their research on the venue, they were very organized, and most important to us, they were very personable and so easy to work with. They added so much fun to the evening. They made the photos so enjoyable, the groomsman and bridesmaids (and us as well) had a blast working with them. The photos we received are absolutely beautiful and we couldn’t be happier!”

name: Ashley + Tyler
review: “I can not recommend them enough!! They were absolutely phenomenal!!! So friendly and thorough. Always responding quickly to questions before the wedding. Covid-19 lead to A LOT of changes for our wedding including 2 location changes, time changes and even changes to the date. Multiple people from the wedding told us how great they were.If you’re looking for an amazing photography team from start to finish, THIS IS THE ONE.”

name: Jazmine
review: Weddings can be so stressful and overwhelming but this pair was exceedingly helpful (and professional) when we needed it the most. They are high energy, creative and play off of each other very well to capture your most precious moments. Our wedding day went by so fast but we both cried as we looked over our photos... And now we get to keep reliving the best day of our lives!!! I would highly recommend using them because not only are they a charming pair but their work is phenomenal!”

name: Lauren + Jacob
review: “I am so thankful that I went with Clint and Cindy as photographers for my wedding. They were considerate towards my husband and I as well as the other guests that were attending. They made sure to capture any moment that we specifically wanted and went above and beyond what we could have ever asked for.”

name: Katie
review: “We recently had Clint and Cindy take our engagement photos. They are professional, efficient, flexible, and friendly. They are very knowledgeable about their craft and knew the best locations, poses, and angles to give us photos that were better than we had imagined. Another great, unique feature is that because they are a couple they are able to relate to the couples they photograph and demonstrate with each other the types of poses and actions they recommended for beautiful and natural looking photos.”

name: M Family
review: “Cindy and Clint are the best! Very detailed and organized with their business, and clearly experienced professionals! We loved the opportunities for candid photos and just going with the flow while following a rough guideline/timeline of where and when to shoot. Their fast response and turn-around time was the cherry on top! Would absolutely hire again.”

name: Danielle
review: “We had the best experience snd will be asking Cindy and clint to do our pictures every year! They are so friendly and made us feel so comfortable while taking pictures. They went above and beyond to ensure everything was in our favor on the day; from checking the location ahead of time, suggesting toys and blanket to bring for pictures, etc. We will be recommending them to everyone we know!”

name: Tammy V
review: “Clint and Cindy are the perfect duo. Their photos definitely show that they are very passionate and talented at what they do. They did an amazing job at taking my portraits. Highly recommend for anyone looking for easy-going, creative, and hard working photographers.”

name: Mai-Lan T
review: “I really enjoyed working with them. They made the experience stress free and comfortable. I also love the energy that they brought to the photo shoot. They made us feel comfortable with the shots they wanted to take and none of them felt “unnatural” or “forced” 10/10 would recommend them.”

name: Breiana
review: “This couple was amazing and a blast to work with! They are very easy to work with and are great listeners. They will make you smile and laugh through the whole thing. They phots turned out beyond what we wanted they are so us and so stunning! We can’t thank them enough!”

name: Rachael & Jon
review: “We absolutely loved Clint & Cindy. They were so professional and also so much fun. When we were shopping around for wedding photographers they stood out to us and did for numerous reasons. First of all, they were super fast in responding to our messages and so personable. They also took the time to answer all our questions over zoom.
